name: Baxton_Studio_Lefteris_Modern_Contemporary_Fabric_Nailheads_Trimmed_Arched_Back_Sofa_Twin_Daybed_with_Roll-out_Trundle_Guest_Bed
reviews: When you open the box it looks intimidating, but I took my time and followed the directions and it turned out great. Very firm, plus adds style to the bedroom.
This is perfect. I am so happy with the comfort level and it was very easy to assemble with clear and understandable directions.
description:
Featuring curvaceous design with large silver nailheads trim, the Lefteris Fabric Nailhead Trimmed Arched Back Sofa Twin Daybed captures the spirit and popularity of upholstered beds in a space-saving package.  Versatile and functional, this 3-in-1 Lefteris Daybed comes with a twin roll-out trundle, so it can accommodate up to two overnight guests.  It's a sofa!  It's a bed!  Yet another bed!  Constructed from CARB-compliant solid hardwood and boasting detailed stitching, it's fully upholstered in a beige linen or grey polyester fabric with comfortable foam-filled.   For studio apartment and condominium where space is limited, the Lefteris could be your reading nook during the day time while transforming into your guest bed for two by rolling out the trundle.  Arched back panel and side panels with large silver nailheads showcase the upscale range of this piece.  The Lefteris can also function as your kids' or teen's bed.  The roll-out trundle can be dressed up with mattress for comfy lounging by day, then has space for friends to sleepover by night.  In your living room, family room or home office, the daybed is a good option for extra seating space during day time while transforming into guest bed for two at night.  Made in Malaysia, the daybed requires assembly.
